titles: Sapho and Phao played beefore the Queenes Maiestie on Shroue-tewsday by Her Maiesties children and the boyes of Paules.
author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.
notes: Attributed to Lyly by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
STC 17086 on reel 554 is actually STC 17086.5--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
